A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A depressing film where the heroes scurry like rats for 2 1/2 hours and almost nothing good happens\, interspersed along the way with odd hit or miss humor. For the life of me\, I have no idea why people think this movie is so good... it really wasn't IMO. The old is torn down and sacrificed to the new\, and Rey is diminished. We get half a movie focused on a pathetic emo\, entitled\, psycho\, murderous manchild who the writers work really hard to want us to care about\, and almost no one seems to care that Kylo killed a true hero\, his own father and has slaughtered countless innocents. Glad I saw it for free. I think I'm done with Star Wars... and I LOVED ep VII\, and have been going opening day since IV. Disappointed and sad.
